# Welcome {.unnumbered}

Welcome to the **"openMSE Technical Guide"** developed and written by Adrian Hordyk, Quang Huynh, and Tom Carruthers from [Blue Matter Science](http://bluematterscience.com).

The intended audience for this book are fisheries scientists and other analysts
who wish to learn how to use `openMSE` for all aspects of Management Strategy Evaluation (MSE): 

- building operating models;
- developing management procedures;
- conducting closed-loop simulation testing;
- summarizing and presenting results.

For more general information about `openMSE`, see the [openMSE website](http://openMSE.com).
